headline.print_headline: No. 13 Ohio St Rolls in 55-14 Win Over Illinois
headline.main: No. 13 Ohio St Rolls in 55-14 Win Over Illinois

lead_paragraph: Curtis Samuel ran for two touchdowns and J.T. Barrett hit Devin Smith on two scoring passes — all in the first half — and No. 13 Ohio State beat Illinois 55-14 on Saturday night, extending the Buckeyes' Big Ten win streak to a record-tying 20.
